body: Hello guys I'm in Vancouver for summer vacation. I'm staying their for 3 days right now. I'll come back on Tuesday night and talk to you guys on Wednesday.
body_tagged: Hello guys I'm in Vancouver for summer vacation. I'm staying their for 3 days right now. I'll come back on Tuesday night and talk to you guys on Wednesday.
title: I'm in Vancouver

replies.body:
I'll slide in before the lock!
;)
